small things that you wear for decoration, such as rings or necklaces

jewellery.translation[0].note_box[0].ite: Jewellery is an uncountable noun and is not used in the plural You say
The thieves stole all my jewellery
The thieves stole all my jewelleries
Jewellery is always followed by a singular verb
When talking about one ring, necklace etc, you say a piece of jewellery or an item of jewellery
She bought an expensive piece of jewellery
